definition: rear view/figure seen from behind/view of the back (of a person or object)
the back of a body or object/to turn one's back/to hide something from/to learn by heart/to recite from memory/unlucky (slang)/hard of hearing
to be burdened/to carry on the back or shoulder
erhua variant of 背影[bei4 ying3]
(slang) (usu. of a woman) sb who looks stunning from behind/sb who has a great figure but not necessarily an attractive face/abbr. to 背殺|背杀[bei4 sha1]

definition: to follow with one's eyes (a departing guest etc)
expression or emotion showing in one's eyes/meaningful glance/wink/eyesight (dialect)
to gaze at/to stare fixedly at
to turn round/to turn one's head/later/by and by
to gaze at/to fix one's eyes on
(of a person) to turn round/to face about/(of a widow) to remarry (archaic)
